thread.title: AC
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by AC

author: AC
title: AC
text: I've now ordered 4 frames, both metal and wood, from AmericanFrame and I've been extreemly pleased with all of them. The packaging is extreemly well done ensuring that my frames arrived in perfect condition. The instructions supplied to put together the metal frames were straightforward and easy. I also loved that I could order exactly the size I want for both the mat and the frame - I don't know anyone else who makes it this easy to get what you need. I will definitely be ordering my frames from them again!
